post0.title: Matrix Derivative Formulae
post0.content: f(x)=xTAx    ⟹  ∂f∂x=(AT+A)xf(x)=x^TAx ~~ implies frac{ partial f}{ partial x} = (A^T+A)xf(x)=xTAx  ⟹∂x∂f​=(AT+A)x .
